title: Wayland, a Lake and Boston: Best of 2 Worlds
posting_body: Lovely updated expanded Cape house 4 bedrooms 2 full baths, skylights, bay windows , gas fireplace inserts, with finished basement.
Beautiful, sunny and nicely well cared for, comfortable house.
There is a private driveway for cars.
Dog is accepted, no cats or birds please.
At the end of the road there is a public path to the Lake Cochituate.
The lake is surrounded by a state park, there are paths through the woods to the lake where one can swim, boat or fish.
On the other side of our road is Dudley pond where you can boat and swim also.
There is great walking around this neighborhood.
We are located 5 minutes from the supermarket, bagel store, pharmacy, a shopping mall and other amenities.
The city of Boston is a 20 minute drive from our home with easy in/out access.
We are 30 minutes from Logan Airport and 30 minutes from the coast line.
Our town is near Colonial Historic sites of the American Revolution.
This is the perfect home to enjoy nature and take a quick drive into the beautiful city of Boston.
